ModMetaData.name: Preset Filtered Zones (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: cuproPanda
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/buuPQel.png[/img] Update of cuproPandas mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1210115905
- Included the [url=https://github.com/Proxyer/FZN]japanese translation[/url] by Proxyer - Added support for translating the labels of the stockpiles - Added presets to storage buildings and stockpiles
[img]https://i.imgur.com/pufA0kM.png[/img]
[table] [tr] [td][url=https://invite.gg/Mlie][img]https://i.imgur.com/zdzzBrc.png[/img][/url][/td] [td][url=https://github.com/emipa606/PresetFilteredZones][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url][/td] [/tr] [tr] [td][img]https://i.imgur.com/WjDSfUn.png[/img][/td] [td][img]https://i.imgur.com/Be8E2qJ.png[/img][/td] [/tr] [/table]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Z4GOv8H.png[/img] Adds new stockpile zones which are already filtered for storing Meals, Meat, Vegetables, Medicine, Joy, Animals, etc. Storage creation is a breeze!
[h1]Workshop ID:[/h1] 1210115905
[h1]Zones Added:[/h1] [b]Meal:[/b] A zone for rottable meals [b]Medicine:[/b] A zone for anything in the medicine category [b]Meat:[/b] A zone for meats other than human and insect [b]Veg:[/b] A zone for rottable fruits, vegetables and edible seeds [b]Joy:[/b] A zone for ingestibles that give joy when consumed. Includes drugs [b]Animal:[/b] A zone for fresh animal corpses. Doesn't include insect or rotting corpses [b]Outdoor:[/b] A zone for Items and Raw Resources that will not deteriorate outside [b]Indoor:[/b] A zone for anything that deteriorates outside
[h1]Save Compatability[/h1] This mod can be added to existing saves. Always back up your saves before adding new mods as there is always the possibility for issues.
[h1]Mod Compatability[/h1] [b]!!! Industrial Rollers:[/b] These zones are not recognized by Industrial Rollers and won't work. Zones are still usable for normal hauling. No known issues yet, please report any issues
[h1]Older Versions and Update Notes[/h1] All versions of this mod can be found on my [url=https://github.com/cuproPanda/Preset-Filtered-Zones/releases]GitHub[/url]. Each release has info on what has changed from the previous release.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/PwoNOj4.png[/img] [list] [*] See if the the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active. [*] If not, try adding your other mods until it happens again. [*] Post your error-log using [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=818773962]HugsLib[/url] and command Ctrl+F12 [*] For best support, please use the Discord-channel for error-reporting. [*] Do not report errors by making a discussion-thread, I get no notification of that. [*] If you have the solution for a problem, please post it to the GitHub repository. [/list]
